caption.p: PCA plot of glucosinolate profiles (based on relative abundance) of Rorippa austriaca populations from the native (cz) and the new range ( g, nl). Plants without herbivory ( closed cages) and with herbivory ( open cages). Different colors indicate different regions of plant origin × herbivory treatment; experimental site (NL and CZ) is not indicated. Samples from plants of one population × herbivory treatment per site were pooled. n = 49. PC1 explains 51% of the variance, PC2 28%. NEO neoglucobrassicin, ARA glucoarabin, HIR glucohirsutin, HESP glucohesperin, SBE glucosiberin, GBC glucobrassicin
